name: James Old
text: Great folks. We're vacationing in Gulf Shores, and I called the shop for advice on buying a bodyboard. They gave me some pointers and recommendations, and I purchased one of their boards. Way better quality than what you'll find in one of the tourist stores on the beach at a comparable price. Highly recommend making the trip.

name: Robyn Nichols
text: Super cool shop. Owner and staff were really friendly. Got some cool merch.

name: cody clark
text: Fantastic surf shop the cutest young man at the counter,  think he said his name was Fabio 😍😍

name: stephen greer
text: Excellent shop for all your surf, skateboard and paddle boarding needs. Great selection of clothing for all. The atmosphere is fantastic and I love the indoor skate ramp. Tambo’s where the true locals hang!

name: David Lang
text: Tambo, Dusty and Kevin always help me out. Love these guys and what they do for the youth in this community. Would highly recommend.

name: Jonathan Bennett
text: TAMBO's is the place to buy all your surfing and skating gear.  Professional service and professional gear and accessories.

name: Notty Head
text: Reminds me of our shops in Jax Beach.

name: Chelsea Walsh
text: We love Tambos!! Mike, Dusty and Kevin have been such blessings to our kids and the community. Both my children are in the skate/surf camp and are learning such awesome skills! Their patience, verbal encouragement and generosity is beyond what words can express. As far as the shop goes, they have the super fun beachy clothes, flip flops, surf boards, stickers and more ☀️

name: Ben Woodbury
text: Kevin set me up with a great deal on a surfboard and even hooked it up with a free ding repair, leash, and a box of wax. Tambo's is worth a stop!

name: Carl Davis
text: This is a Awesome Skateboard & Surf Shop . I was blown away by the indoor ramp . A must see an vist spot in Gulf Shores AL.. 😎👍

name: mason abraham
text: i went in to get my first board and the owner was very helpful, explained what the differences are from board to board and the pros and cons of each, they also have a nice indoor park with boards anybody can ride. Definitely a lot better than zumiez

name: Tyler Leslie
text: Super friendly and welcoming! Highly recommend! Go support this business!

name: Isaiah Hammaccc
text: This is the best surf shop near me 😂the people were really friendly and I got good vibes 🤙🏾🤙🏾

name: Amanda Saltino
text: Very helpful, cool place. Great service.

name: Squid Lax
text: Bought a board here and it’s great quality. Everyone there was very nice and knowledgeable unlike a chain of stores such as Ron Jon’s. I’ll definitely be back to buy another board.

name: Graham Andre
text:
Went in to grab some wax, no one was at the counter, and the employees were skate boarding and did not seem interested in helping us out. The male employee tried to included us by witnessing a new skill however the female empolyee was snappy and rude saying she didnt know us. After a few minutes of standing there the male employee did finally help and even showed how to wax our board properly but after the comment it made the rest of the time there awkward.
Overall the customer service just needs worked on.

name: Johnny Mullen
text: Knowledgeable and fun staff with a huge board selection. Board rentals and demos available so you know you’ll love the board you buy. In house brand is really cool and I had to come home with a shirt. Stop by if you skate, surf, or just want to check out a cool local shop that knows where you need to go to hit the best waves the Bama gulf coast has to offer!

name: henry yoes
text:
Absolutely great shop. Owner mike is great. local surfers and skimmers friendly. Proper surf shop. Highly recommend for a visit on your trip.

- Hank

name: Lyle Burkhardt
text: Awesome surf and skate shop. Wonderfully done coffee shop in the back with great lattes. A very relaxed and friendly vibe. I felt I could have stayed for 2 hours just conversing and drinking coffee.

name: Dean Williams
text: Bought my first board from Tambo and got real advice.  He didn't try to up sell me, he honestly sold me a board that fight me and what I needed out of a board because I'm a beginner.  Great Service!  I'll be back

name: Julie Gilley
text: Best indoors sake place 😀😃😄😁😆

name: Trip Starkey
text: Very helpful staff, great coffee shop in the back

name: rcox3362
text: Awesome place cool vibes. I like their shirts friendly staff.

name: kyle williams
text: The owner is super--friendly and very knowledgeable about this surf thing.

name: David Butler
text: Cannot wait to see. Do not miss this guys, very nice job Tambo.August is going to be awesome.

name: Jonas Stawski
text: Mike is the man! Awesome vibe at the shop!

name: Dan S
text: Great people!

name: Thomas Gilmore
text: Great place!

name: Dan S
text: Great people!

name: Ava Grace
text:
(Translated by Google) heyyyyyyyyyy

(Original)
Heyyyyyyyyyy
